Commercial Excellence Digital Solutions - Adaptable

OVERVIEW

Accenture Insights Platform (AIP) is a cloud based platform offering which rapidly enables analytics environments and provides a powerful tool set in a comprehensive data integration platform.

The platform can allow data scientists to define predictive analytic models, apply them on defined data sets, and process the outcome without being bothered by the underlying infrastructure setup, security, and management.

Custom built or off the shelf applications can be added on top of the platform to enhance insight into data.

VALUE PROPOSITION


End to End Technology

Market leading technologies for information management and analytics


Pay by the Drink Commercials

Low upfront investment, monthly subscription model, with scale up and scale down flexibility


Automated Provisioning

Pre-configured stack of tools - environment provisioned in less than 24 hours reducing time to business insight


Expertise in App Development

Leverage Accenture expertise, vertical industry solutions and Apps to further accelerate speed to insights and outcome


Best Practice Security

With hardened security, monitored and managed from a command and control centre


24/7 Global Support

Trained and certified support teams located in India, Argentina and the US provide 24x7 support

CORE AIP STACK

The Accenture Insights Platform is a simple, flexible and attractive commercial model and can be set up and run quickly in an “as-a-service” framework.

Choose from a set of pre-configured set of tools and technologies on the cloud to avail of our commercial benefits and support or add a couple of your own which you manage.

Build industry specific applications using our Accenture design studio and embed analytics into your workflow. The applications built on the design studio are platform agnostic and can also be hosted on premise.

The Accenture Insights Platform delivers value at unparalleled speed and the ability to scale up or down very quickly with a flexible commercial model.

Business Benefit

Implementing a comprehensive digital solution for customer engagement drove a 1.8% increase in sales

Implementation Duration

Typically 3-6 months weeks to customize and implement the App in the client environment

Modeling markets and improving forecast of gas demands

Multinational Oil and Gas Company

Client Challenge
  • Low maturity in Big-Data-Analytics
  • Lack of predictive analytics capabilities
  • Missing strategic market intelligence approach
Accenture Value
    Accenture helped the client with developing a flexible and customized solution aligned with their processes to model markets, structure contracts, and accurately forecast gas withdrawals.

  • Native integration with analytical engines
  • Definition of weather zones and market zones
  • Rapid improvement of related process
  • Enhancement of capacity and storage analysis
  • Integration of market data with transmission and distribution system operators
Business Benefit

Improving the demand forecasting accuracy by 30%, resulted in an unbalancing cost reduction of 3.5M EUR per year

Implementation Duration

Typically 3-6 months weeks to customize and implement the App in the client environment

Establishing a competitive CRM program

Major Integrated Steel Company

Client Challenge
  • Lack of customer analytics capabilities
  • Weak customer relationship management
  • Inefficient CRM business processes
  • Low maturity of digital customer
  • Communication channels
  • Low maturity of CRM technologies
Accenture Value
    Accenture collaborated with the client to develop an all-embracing customer relationship management program to increase sales and enhance marketing impacts in order to have a stronger competitive advantage.

  • Creation of CRM vision, program framework, and a high-level implementation roadmap
  • Performing process re-engineering based on customer segments and channels
  • Embedding analytics in processes
  • Implementing CRM technologies (SAP CRM, SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence)
  • Developing customer and distributor portal, and loyalty platform
Business Benefit

Realizing analytics-based, profit-triggering insight about customers, sales pipeline and product portfolio performance

Implementation Duration

Typically 3-6 months weeks to customize and implement the App in the client environment

Enabling digital marketing, e-orders and online transactions

Major Industrial Gases Company

Client Challenge
  • High Customer churn rate
  • Primarily offline transactions
  • Lack of targeted marketing approach
  • Low maturity in digital capabilities
Accenture Value
    Accenture supported the client in performing the shift from offline to online transactions. Email is a key driver of this shift by transforming customer registrations to orders and engagement.

  • Realization of e-commerce platform for multiple channels
  • Develop digital capabilities roadmap
  • Integrate e-commerce platform with SAP
  • Define e-commerce organization
Business Benefit

Targeting 1 million customers, Accenture led a partnership to digitize marketing, increasing fill-rates and revenue

Implementation Duration

Typically 3-6 months weeks to customize and implement the App in the client environment

BUSINESS BENEFIT

Fast
Flexible
Transformational

The Accenture Insights Platform can be customized to individual client needs across functions and industries. The business benefits vary by the clients situation and can be summarized into five broad business results.

Digital Consumer Analytics

Accenture’s Consumer Digital Journey captures customer interaction across channels to form an integrated view for maximum influence on engagement using data-driven holistic view of the customer experience.

Social Network Analytics

Social Network Analytics studies connected users and propagation of events to build viral models that estimate the influence. Measures the behaviour influence to identify the products / services and communities where exist more capacity of influence in customers.

Data Monetization

Data monetization helps in generating new revenue streams from data held inside organisations, by processing the data into usable forms, or generating usable observations and insights from it.

Churn Modeling

Churn management helps in identify customers who more likely to churn, identify root causes, enhances the customer lifecycle value, and drive positive customer experience. Predictive statistical models are used to create customer churn propensity score including logistic regression, decision tree etc.

Segmentation

Segmentation divides the customer base into heterogeneous groups using attributes like purchasing behavior, demographics etc. for enhanced customer management.
